post.body: welcome home!!! U were missed!!
looks and sounds like a perfect Sat afternoon! I think I might have to go mix one of those up for myself too!
so skinny pirates only?
check out cheesecupid.com - a cool site to help w/ cheese and drink pairings. Thought u might like it for ur party tonight!
wine? Spanish cheese? Can I come? :)
Bought a wedding dress 2day and it tops my list of prettiest things I own. Kinda weird spending all that $ and not gettin to take it home
http://twitpic.com/zdq9 - Poor Ruby, she's broken!!
http://twitpic.com/zc98 - Bridal show that is a little too intense
At the Seattle wedding show and officially succumbing to sensory overload.
Very much ready to leave....the anti-Utes vibe here is killing me! Bama fans here want to kill me and I'm not even a tru Ute!!!!
Nothing like having back to back meetings that are set up to destroy all marketing plans created for 2009. Mildly frustrating...
Space heaters are a blessing when your cube is colder than the freezing temps outside. Its my most prized office possession.
What a wonderfully cozy, lazy day to ease into the New Year. Great book, good music, warm blankets and a cold day outdoors.
Headin home. Its nice to get out early!
Totally just hit a wall - going to need some caffeine if I'm going to make it to midnight!
Have a wonderful last day of the year everybody! Cheers to 2009!!!
ahhhhh....TV and laptop in a cozy bed. Ain't nothing like it! - http://bkite.com/03lL9
Nothing like standing in freezing cold winds after a long hard workout (hint: sarcasm) I have the bodily version of brain freeze!
Headin to gym and crossin my fingers that the post-holiday post-work 5pm rush doesn't render the place uncomfortably packed.
Turns out hot cocoa is a great way to wean ur body off the crazy chocolaty sweets addiction you had grown used to over the holiday season.
